name: schema_response_action_read
description:
This retrieves a paginated list of all Schema Response Actions created for a Schema Response.
#### Returns
Returns a JSON object with a `data` key containing the representation of the requested Schema Response Actions, if the request is successful.
#### Errors
If the request is unsuccessful, an `errors` key containing information about the failure will be returned. Refer to the [list of error codes](#tag/Errors-and-Error-Codes) to understand why this request may have failed.

schema_response_id.description: The unique identifier of the Registration Schema example `6176c9d45e01f100091d4f94`.

$ul: **auto**: Bool of representing whether a user created the action.
**comment**: A comment made explaining the reasoning of the action.
**date_created**: The date the action was created.
**from_state**: The name of the state of the Schema Response prior to the creation of the action.
**to_state**: The name of the state of the Schema Response after the creation of the action
**trigger**: The name of the trigger that caused the action.
**visible**: Bool of representing whether the action is visible.
**id**: The unique identifier of the Schema Response Action.
**links**: URLs to alternative representations of the Registration Schema entity.
**self**: A link to the detail page for a Registration Schema.
**relationships**: Links to other entities or entity collections that have a relationship to the Schema Response Action entity.
**creator**: A link to the node the file is on.
**target**: A link to the node the file is on.
**type**: The type identifier of the Schema Response Action (`schema-response-actions`).
